title: Exploring Partitioning in PostgreSQL
content: This post discusses performance optimization techniques using RANGE partitioning in PostgreSQL. It provides tips and examples to enhance data retrieval efficiency.

title: Summary of How to Use AI Technology Video and My Thoughts
tags: AI Technology, Developer, Collaboration, Coding Tools
content: This article summarizes the discussion on the development of AI technology and the changing role of developers, and how to use AI coding tools.

title: 2023 Retrospective
tags: Onboarding, Woowahan Tech Course, Job Seeker, Retrospective
content: My 2023 can be described as a "New Future" born from monotony. As a 4th-year student, I made many attempts, prepared for employment, and even participated in Woowahan Tech Course. While others might not see much significance, I am proud to have definitely progressed more than last year. Initially, I focused on the existing Daechunggyo...
